text: The Cadillac XTS is a full-size luxury sedan made by Cadillac. It was introduced in 2012 and was produced until 2019. The XTS replaced the Cadillac STS and the Cadillac STS-V sedans it had features like a touchscreen infotainment system, a V6 engine, and safety systems like automatic braking and parking sensors. ==Discontinuation== In 2019, Cadillac stopped making the XTS. With this The company shifted its focus to SUVs and crossovers, ==References== XTS
title: Cadillac XTS
